title: Electric PE - triangle with charges 3Q 3Q and -Q

content.question: Three charged particles are held in place at the vertices of an equilateral triangle of side length <math alttext="s" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>s</mi></math>, as shown in the figure. How much work must be done by external forces in order to move the particles from rest very far apart into the configuration shown in the figure?

choices.label: <math alttext="the positive fraction with numerator 3 k Q squared and denominator s" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>k</mi><msup><mi>Q</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mi>s</mi></mfrac></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the positive fraction with numerator 5 k Q squared and denominator s" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>5</mn><mi>k</mi><msup><mi>Q</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mi>s</mi></mfrac></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the positive fraction with numerator 9 k Q squared and denominator s" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>9</mn><mi>k</mi><msup><mi>Q</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mi>s</mi></mfrac></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the positive fraction with numerator 15 k Q squared and denominator s" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>15</mn><mi>k</mi><msup><mi>Q</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mi>s</mi></mfrac></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the positive fraction with numerator 3 k Q squared and denominator s" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>k</mi><msup><mi>Q</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mi>s</mi></mfrac></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
